title: LTL Christmas Dinner
text: We enjoyed a lovely lab-wide dinner to celebrate the end of the term together!

title: LTL @ CHIA Conference
text: LTL has been invited to present at the CHIA Conference. We are very happy to share our research presentations and posters with academic and professional communities worldwide!

title: LTL @ EMNLP 2023
text: Please find attached a selection of group photos of LTL at the EMNLP 2023 Conference in Singapore!

title: LTL Halloween Party
